cause.description:
www.blackle.com
Blackle is Google's Black Version. you know on Google, there's that reallyreally white background well. it wastes a hell of a lot of energy. so Google decided to create Blackle if people use Blackle more often, so much energy can be saved, it is predicted about 750-megawatts a year. This is a hell of a lot energy! So by using less energy, less carbon emissions are emitted.. thus helping prevent global warming & saving polar bears & doing all the things that are now under threat.. because it saves energy :))))

the only problem with Blackle is: you can not search for Images etc,, just words. like "Web" on Google.
you should use Blackle. because it doesn't take ages to load, it's not difficult, yet it is so potentially benefiting thank you you should tell more people, if you want to :L
XXX SO JOIN TODAY! use BLACKLE when searching for Informatiiiionn :D thank you! you don't have to join this cause just because you are (going to) use(ing) Blackle.
